thread.title: Casino project offers hope to NY's struggling Southern Tier
thread.title_full: Casino project offers hope to NY's struggling Southern Tier - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Casino project offers hope to NY's struggling Southern Tier
text:
By DAVID KLEPPER
Associated Press OWEGO, N.Y. (AP) - A new resort casino is likely headed to New York's Southern Tier, but local leaders caution that while it will mean jobs and tourism, it's not enough by itself to solve the region's long-standing economic problems.
Tioga Downs plans to expand its offerings and build a hotel, restaurants and concert venue at its existing race track slot parlor in Nichols. The plan was endorsed by state gambling regulators Wednesday.
The region along the Pennsylvania border has struggled for decades as manufacturing plants closed and the population fell.
Binghamton Mayor Richard David says the casino is great news but won't be a 'silver bullet.'
The region is also competing for a $500 million economic development prize which David says would be a huge boost.
